channel.title: Dezible
channel.description: Welcome to Dezible, where I will share my findings on the topic of Explainable AI And who am I? And why do I want to talk about this topic? My name is Aditya Bhardwaj and am currently a PhD candidate at University of Twente - you can find me here through LinkedIn profile I am deeply interested in following the progress in the area of XAI (yes, that is the term for eXplainable AI), specially in the methods of evaluating such XAI models.

item.title: Basics of XAI
